con:testStep.name: Help
con:testStep.con:description:
1. This test suite is designed to test all ISPC, - Create,Approve, Confirm, Read. 2. A single test case creates payment for all ISPC with its data derived from an excel, a datacolumn is added for the respective ISPC so that it can be asserted with the ISPC from PaymentCreate response
How to test : {Test suite designed for BM} - Change envs endpoint on project level - Make sure DataSource Excel is within the path where your project is saved - Create all payment, Keep eye on requested execution date, Ideally it should be next day, else in some cases, PIN will call online reservaiton from status update which makes test case failure..
How to change test suite to bank employee or PM?. - Just change header items with proper values. Run test suite.
Adding new case/ISPC: Clone one of the test case, Change name and test case description.. Modify test steps.
